page.title: 01TRADE
page.content: {Charnock Farm Nursery}opens at 9.00am, sometimes earlier.During the winter it closes at 5.00pm but in summer is open until 9.00pm.The owner has lived in the area since 1904 and has owned the farm since 1973.Before becoming a commercial grower he was in the army. The Garden Centre sells almost everything for the gardener including plants,trees,sheds,greenhouses and garden furniture as well as fruit and vegetables.The land around the Nursery has been farmed since 1680 but over the years much of it has been put to other purposes and the Nursery alone remains.The owner employs five part time workers who do everything including stacking the shelves at the end of the day.As many as 1200 people may visit the Nursery on busy Sundays in the summer.
